db:abstract.db:para: A QML application that demonstrates visualizing a 3D scene.

db:article.db:programlisting:
!include( ../examples.pri ) { error( "Couldn't find the examples.pri file!" ) }
QT += qml quick 3dinput
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
OTHER_FILES += \ AnimatedEntity.qml \ main.qml
RESOURCES += \ scene3d.qrc
